name: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures chomping onto consoles, PC on Oct. 29th, 3DS a bit later
text: Update: New Comic-Con trailer addedNamco Bandai has announced that Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures is headed to consoles and the PC on October 29th, and the 3DS about a month later on November 26th. The game will hit retail at $39.99 for all platforms.Pac-Mans next big adventure, based on the hit Disney XD animated series of the same name, is a fun-looking 3D platformer that loosely follows the show. Take a look at some new screens to go along with the announcement below.PAC-MAN and the Ghostly Adventures Comic-Con trailer:[youtube_sc url=_zxo-IBTiK447 width=600]Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures screens:We are pleased to announce that NAMCO BANDAI Games beloved yellow chomping hero will be making his revamped and boisterous return to gaming in PAC-MAN and the Ghostly Adventures on October 29th, 2013 the Xbox 360 games and entertainment system from Microsoft, PlayStation 3 computer entertainment system, Wii U System and STEAM; while the Nintendo 3DS version will be available on November 26th, 2013.PAC-MAN and the Ghostly Adventures is a bustling and bonkers world of action, adventures and wackiness featuring the Pacster and his teenage friends working together to free Pac World from the threat of Betrayus and the netherworld ghosts. After the summer premiere of the TV animation series on Disney XD, PAC-MAN and the Ghostly Adventures quickly claimed top TV rankings as the #1 daily show among Boys ages 6-11 on Disney XD. Against this demographic, the show also became the #4 daily show in the U.S. and the only Disney XD daily show in the Top 6.
